author: Special Correspondent
text:
District Collector N. Subbaiyan flagged off an election awareness rally here on Tuesday in which a large number of students from the Kundavai Nachiyar Government Arts College for Women carried placards heralding the need for the eligible voters to exercise their franchise.

To ensue a free and fair polls and to ensue 100 per cent participation in the democratic process by the eligible voters, awareness campaign had been launched. Handbills and pamphlets were distributed among the public to enlighten them on the need to vote.

Thanjavur RDO Jaibheem, Corporation Commissioner Varadarajan, Red Cross office-bearers Dr. V. Varadarajan, S. Rajamanikkam and Muthukumar were present.
title: College students take out rally
